driverQueries.driverLogin: SELECT * FROM DriverDetails WHERE DriverEmail = ? AND DriverPassword = ?
driverQueries.getDriverById: SELECT d.*, v.VehicleNumber, v.VehicleType FROM DriverDetails d JOIN VehicleDetails v ON v.VehicleId = d.VehicleId WHERE DriverId = ?
driverQueries.getDriverAssignedTrips: SELECT c.*, e.EmployeeAddress, e.EmployeeCity FROM cabAllocationML c JOIN EmployeeDetails e ON c.EmployeeId = e.EmployeeId JOIN DriverDetails d ON d.VehicleId = c.VehicleId WHERE d.DriverId = ?
driverQueries.getDriverHistory: SELECT t.BookingId, t.TripDate, ca.PriorityOrder, cb.EmployeeName, cb.EmployeeAddress, t.StartTime, t.EndTime  FROM tripmanagement t JOIN cabbookingtable cb ON t.BookingId = cb.BookingId JOIN caballocationml ca ON ca.BookingId = cb.BookingId JOIN driverdetails d ON d.VehicleId = ca.VehicleId WHERE d.DriverId = ? ORDER BY ca.PriorityOrder ASC
